panels.description: The total incoming bitrate for the video bridge in kilobits per second.
panels.title: Bitrate download

panels.description: The total outgoing bitrate for the video bridge in kilobits per second.
panels.title: Bitrate upload

panels.description: The number of Java threads that the video bridge is using.
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: An estimation of the number of current video streams forwarded by the bridge.
panels.title: Video streams

panels.description: An average value (in milliseconds) of the RTT across all streams.
panels.title: RTT

panels.description: The sum of the lengths of all completed conferences, in seconds.
panels.title: Completed conferences

panels.description: The number of participants in the largest conference currently hosted on the bridge.
panels.title: Biggest conference

panels.description: The total number of conferences created on the bridge.
panels.title: Total conferences

panels.description: The current number of conferences.
panels.title: Conferences

panels.description: The current number of participants.
panels.title: Participants

panels.description: The total incoming/outgoing bitrate for the video bridge in kilobits per second.
panels.title: Bitrate

panels.description: The total incoming/outgoing packet rate for the video bridge in packets per second.
panels.title: Package rate

panels.description:
The fraction of lost incoming RTP packets. This is based on RTP sequence numbers and is relatively accurate.
The fraction of lost outgoing RTP packets. This is based on incoming RTCP Receiver Reports, and an attempt to subtract the fraction of packets that were not sent (i.e. were lost before they reached the bridge). Further, this is averaged over all streams of all users as opposed to all packets, so it is not correctly weighted. This is not accurate, but may be a useful metric nonetheless.
panels.title: Lost RTP packets

panels.description: Experimental. An average value (in milliseconds) of the jitter calculated for incoming and outgoing streams. This hasn't been tested and it is currently not known whether the values are correct or not.
panels.title: Jitter aggregate

panels.description: An average value (in milliseconds) of the RTT across all streams.
panels.title: RTT

panels.description: The current number of audio/video channels.
panels.title: Audio/Video channels

panels.description: The total number messages sent/received through COLIBRI web sockets.
panels.title: Sent/Received websockets

panels.description: The rate of failed conferences on the bridge. A conference is marked as failed when all of its channels have failed. A channel is marked as failed if it had no payload activity.
panels.title: Failed conferences

panels.description: The total number messages sent/received through data channels.
panels.title: Sent/Received messages

panels.description: Stress level reported to Jicofo by the videobridge.
panels.title: Videobridge stress level
